snippet.title: Genesis 2 - Game Boy Trailer
snippet.description:
GENESIS is back in this sequel!

When the malevolent AI GENESIS was defeated, a small fragment of its source code managed to escape and hide on an asteroid. Unnoticed, GENESIS gathered new energy and has now become stronger than ever, ready to unleash its wrath on Earth once again to eradicate all life...

Fight your way through five exciting levels to defeat each boss and prepare yourself to face the ultimate challenge, your final battle against AI GENESIS!

www.incube8games.com
